name: ai.cerb.timerEditor.schedule.add
description: Examples for the automation timer editor
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      title: Add schedule by example
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_schedule:
          data:
            5min:
              label: Every 5 mins
              pattern@text:
                # Every 5 mins
                */5 * * * *
                
            1hr:
              label: Every hour
              pattern@text:
                # Every hour
                0 * * * *
                
            8am:
              label: At 8am every day
              pattern@text:
                # At 8am every day
                0 8 * * *
                
            5pm:
              label: At 5:30pm every weekday
              pattern@text:
                # At 5:30pm every weekday
                30 17 * * 1-5
                
            weekdays:
              label: Once every weekday
              pattern@text:
                # Once every weekday
                0 0 * * 1-5
                
            weekends:
              label: Once every weekend
              pattern@text:
                # Once every weekend day
                0 0 * * 6-7
                
            mon:
              label: Monday
              pattern@text:
                # Once every Monday
                0 0 * * 1
                
            tue:
              label: Tuesday
              pattern@text:
                # Once every Tuesday
                0 0 * * 2
                
            wed:
              label: Wednesday
              pattern@text:
                # Once every Wednesday
                0 0 * * 3
                
            thu:
              label: Thursday
              pattern@text:
                # Once every Thursday
                0 0 * * 4
                
            fri:
              label: Friday
              pattern@text:
                # Once every Friday
                0 0 * * 5
                
            sat:
              label: Saturday
              pattern@text:
                # Once every Saturday
                0 0 * * 6
                
            sun:
              label: Sunday
              pattern@text:
                # Once every Sunday
                0 0 * * 7
                
            1st:
              label: First day of every month
              pattern@text:
                # First day of every month
                0 0 1 * *
                
            ldon:
              label: Last day of every month
              pattern@text:
                # Last day of every month
                0 0 L * *
            
            jan1:
              label: Every year on Jan 1
              pattern@text:
                # Every year on Jan 1
                0 0 1 1 *
                
            thanksgiving:
              label: Last Thursday of November
              pattern@text:
                # Last Thursday of November
                0 0 22-28 11 4
                
          schema:
            layout:
              filtering@bool: yes
              paging@bool: yes
              headings@bool: no
              title_column: label
            columns:
              selection/pattern:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/label:
                label: Examples
  
  return:
    snippet@key: prompt_schedule
